title: Great bargainβ€
content: Its a lovely hotel - lots of space, huge bathroom, great pool view and very clean overall. Rates are very competitive, especially on weekdays. The only thing to consider is proximity; Studio City is slightly far off from the other main hotels like Venetian/Parisian/Londoner so you need to grab the free shuttle bus or expect to do a bit of walking.
